aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.description:
CPC professional with 1,8 years of experience in cash handling operations (counting, sorting, packing money) and ATM validation.

Track record of improving operational efficiency through technical solutions such as in-house barcode application development.

Committed to contributing to the Java region with high integrity and rigor.
aboutSection.businessDescription:
Software Engineering graduate with a focus on frontend development and graphic design.

Integrate aesthetics and strategy to create memorable and long-lasting branding.

Active in blogging, graphic design, and developing IoT-based technologies.

workProject.title: Portofolio
workProject.description: This is my projects that I have worked on.

project-1.title: Barcode Realtime
project-1.description: This application was designed to resolve the issue of barcodes becoming damaged or losing some of their lines, which prevents them from being scanned correctly. Barcodes play a crucial role in helping my team work more efficiently. With functional barcodes, we can input data much faster.

project-2.title: Nexanime
project-2.description: This is an anime information website similar to MyAnimeList, but built with Next.js to provide a modern and fast user experience.
